Thu Dec 28 03:01:35 PM UTC 2023
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/bin
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/bin/hmac256 /opt/bin//hmac256
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/bin/libgcrypt-config /opt/bin//libgcrypt-config
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/bin/mpicalc /opt/bin//mpicalc
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/bin/dumpsexp /opt/bin//dumpsexp
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/include
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/include/gcrypt.h /opt/include//gcrypt.h
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/lib
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/lib//pkgconfig
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/lib/libgcrypt.so.20 /opt/lib//libgcrypt.so.20
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/lib/libgcrypt.so /opt/lib//libgcrypt.so
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/lib/libgcrypt.so.20.4.3 /opt/lib//libgcrypt.so.20.4.3
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/lib/libgcrypt.la /opt/lib//libgcrypt.la
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/lib/pkgconfig/libgcrypt.pc /opt/lib//pkgconfig/libgcrypt.pc
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share//info
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share//aclocal
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share//man
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share//man/man1
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/share/info/gcrypt.info-1 /opt/share//info/gcrypt.info-1
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/share/info/dir /opt/share//info/dir
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/share/info/gcrypt.info /opt/share//info/gcrypt.info
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/share/info/gcrypt.info-2 /opt/share//info/gcrypt.info-2
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/share/aclocal/libgcrypt.m4 /opt/share//aclocal/libgcrypt.m4
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/share/man/man1/hmac256.1 /opt/share//man/man1/hmac256.1
